If you have not had chickenpox and you come into contact with someone who has shingles, ask your healthcare provider whether you should get a chickenpox vaccination.  To learn more, see ""What You Need to Know about Shingles and the Shingles Vaccine.""",NIHSeniorHealth,Shingles
